project.description: This job runs the kube-up.sh and kube-down.sh scripts.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x echo ================================================== echo Build a Docker container with the secrets. echo ================================================== echo set -x
cp $CREDS_YAML credentials.yaml
cat << EOF > Dockerfile FROM jujusolutions/charmbox:devel RUN mkdir -p /home/ubuntu/.local/share/juju ADD ./credentials.yaml /home/ubuntu/.local/share/juju/credentials.yaml RUN chown ubuntu:ubuntu /home/ubuntu/.local/share/juju/credentials.yaml EOF
docker build -t juju-2-container .
rm credentials.yaml

set +x echo ================================================== echo Bootstrap the Juju google provider. echo ================================================== echo set -x cat << EOF > bootstrap_kube-up.sh juju bootstrap amazon aws juju add-model jenkins-test-model cd kubernetes cluster/kube-up.sh EOF chmod +x bootstrap_kube-up.sh docker run --rm \ -u ubuntu \ -e KUBERNETES_PROVIDER=juju \ -v $PWD:/home/ubuntu/kubernetes \ -v $PWD/bootstrap_kube-up.sh:/home/ubuntu/bootstrap_kube-up.sh \ -w /home/ubuntu/ \ juju-2-container \ /home/ubuntu/bootstrap_kube-up.sh

set +x echo "==================================================" echo " Cleanup with a hammer phase" echo "==================================================" echo "" echo "" sleep 3 set +e docker rm $(docker ps -aq) docker rmi gce-charmbox
ls -al
